data.reason: No candidate matches proven WON setups within risk rules. Market neutral (BTC -0.07%), so no need to force risk. POL is +19.3% with RSI 74.3 (overbought and gain >15%), violating AVOID rule and too extended versus prior POL/IRYS wins. BLZ (+21.7%) and VVV (+8.9%) both have RSI >70 or VW-RSI extremely elevated (chasing, high mean-reversion risk). STX and AKT have acceptable RSI bands but only 1H BUY (not STRONG_BUY) and lack the clean Tier 1/2 structure that characterized prior POL/IRYS wins; also their 24h gains (5.6% and 13.2%) sit outside the ideal 3–5% Tier 1 band and do not clearly reproduce the exact WON playbook. In line with PATIENCE and to avoid repeating LOSING Tier 1/Tier 2 chases, best decision is to wait for a cleaner Tier 1 (RSI 50–60, gain 3–5%, 1H STRONG_BUY, MACD clearly bullish) or Tier 2 (RSI 60–70, gain >5% but <15%, 1H STRONG_BUY) setup before deploying capital.
